docna.cdata!:
Bangladesh - Second Bangladesh Shilpa Bank
            Project : Credit 1117 - Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Bangladesh - Second Bangladesh
            Shilpa Bank Project : Credit 1117 - Project Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Bangladesh - Second Bangladesh Shilpa Bank
            Project : Credit 1117 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Bangladesh - Second Bangladesh
            Shilpa Bank Project : Credit 1117 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project intends to expand private
            investment in non-traditional export and import-substitution
            industries, and projects in less-developed areas, through
            provision of foreign exchange for term financing; to
            continue the institutional development of BSB, with
            particular emphasis on economic and sector review
            activities; and, to develop coordinated mechanisms to reduce
            private sector arrears on term loans from the banking system.
